title: Global pork exports 2020 , by country
yAxis: Export volume in thousand metric tons
summary: This statistic depicts the Export volume of exports 2020 worldwide in 2020 , country leading , in thousand metric tons .
The exports 2020 pork of the United_States amounted to approximately 3221 thousand metric tons in that year .
gold: This statistic depicts the forecast export volume of pork worldwide in 2020 , by leading country . The estimated pork exports of the United States were amounted to approximately 3.22 million metric tons in 2020 .
